summary: Single-page romantic playful web app with centered question, Yes/No buttons, a success page with cute animation, and an evasive No button that moves randomly across the full viewport on hover/tap/click using plain HTML/CSS/JS (no external libraries).
architectural_notes: Use only plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (no external libraries).
Position the 'No' button with CSS position: fixed and randomize top/left using window.innerWidth/innerHeight.
Clamp random positions so the 'No' button stays fully visible within viewport boundaries.
Handle mouseenter/hover, touch, and click events to ensure evasive movement on desktop and mobile; clicking 'No' must never trigger navigation/action.
